channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW10 Potholes problem, 2nd July
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus 15 minutes delay boards needed carriage way pothole 300x300x50mm (CW10 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Junction of Winchcombe St & Albion St GL52 2LX, 1st July
item.description:
Could someone please advise a) whether the apparent cctv cam on a high pole at junction of Winchcombe St & Albion St GL52 2LX, is in fact a cctv cam and if so, b) whether it is operated by Glos CC Highways? I have emailed but received no reply. Please contact
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Albion Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Political Poster on Highways Land, 1st July
item.description:
A conservative political post has been placed on the road verge near a field gate opposite the entrance to Brickhampton Gold Club. I don't believe that this is allowed on highways managed land.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Offensive - illegal? Graffiti, 1st July
item.description:
Graffiti has been painted onto the foot / cycle path at the first corner to the front of Sainsburys delivery loading bays. It is at the Barnet Way end. The graffiti itself is offensive, possibly illegally naming an innocent person and/or could be classed as a hate crime. It appeared between 2130 hours 30 June and 0930 hrs 1 July 2024.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
